# PKObject

**Class**

An opaque type that acts as the superclass for the pass object.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKObject
```

## Overview

Never use this class directly. Use the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPass] or [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentPass] classes instead.

## Related Documentation

- **Apple Pay Programming Guide**
- **Wallet Developer Guide**

## Common data types

- **PKAddPassButton**: Provides a button that enables users to add passes to Wallet.
- **PKLabeledValue**: An object that can represent a detail about a payment card or other item.
- **AddPassToWalletButton**: A type that provides a button that enables people to add a new or existing pass to Apple Wallet.
- **AddPassToWalletButtonFilter**
- **AddPassToWalletButtonResponse**
- **AddPassToWalletButtonStyle**

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- PKPass

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
